item.description:
Hi All,

Mt Tom is in the foothills of the Berkshires in Holyoke Ma. I plan to hike along the main ridge line. The trail has a short steep section followed by a rolling trail that follows the ridge. One of the few hikes that you have a great view for most of the way. Total hike distance will be about 5 miles but we can add a short additional hike at the end if people want to go further. Mt Tom is about 2 hours west of Boston - you take the pike to rt 91. For full directions and trail map check out - http://www.mass.gov/d...

It looks like Sunday will be another great weather day!

We can meet in Harvard Square at 9am (corner of Mt Auburn and JFK st) OR at the main entrance to Mt Tom State Reservation at 11am. I can drive and take up to 4 others.

Tom
item.how_to_find_us: Shiny Black Masda SUV with "617" license plate.
item.name: Mt Tom Hike
